name: Hasted
description: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target's speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, it has Advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns.
endConditions: The caster is incapacitated or dies

lethargyEffect.description: When the spell ends, the target can't move or take actions until after its next turn, as a wave of lethargy sweeps over it.
lethargyEffect.duration: Until end of the target's next turn after the spell ends

notes: The extra action is limited to the listed options -- it cannot be used to cast a spell or use a feature that requires a full action. The lethargy at the end is a significant drawback if Concentration is broken mid-combat.
